name: orions-gate
description: Orion's Gate â€” Modern YouTube client for Linux/Windows with DPI bypass, ad blocking, privacy, and VOT integration.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsup --config tsup.config.ts --env.NODE_ENV production && vite build --config vite.renderer.config.ts
scripts.logs:auto: node -e "const path=require('path'), os=require('os'); console.log(path.join(os.homedir(), '.config', 'orions-gate', 'logs', 'main.log'))" | xargs -I{} tail -n 200 -f {}
scripts.make:win: npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.make:deb: npm run build && electron-builder --linux deb --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.make:rpm: npm run build && electron-builder --linux rpm --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.make:appimage: npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build && npx playwright test
